title.newValue: Microsoft Syntex: Split PDF pages into new PDF files with the Extract action in OneDrive for iOS

description.newValue:
Users of Microsoft Syntex can now split a PDF file into multiple PDFs with the Extract file action in OneDrive for iOS. The Extract file action lets you quickly split and extract multiple pages of a PDF into a new PDF file stored in SharePoint or OneDrive.
GA date: May CY2023
